Articles.Content:
> 
> You don't see this?
> [http://i.imgur.com/1duLEyc.png](http://i.imgur.com/1duLEyc.png)

The image I saw before did not have Kerbin in the background. Maybe it was a hypellusion.

> 
> The background is on the site home page, not the store.

You mean [https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/) ? Text only for me. Petty class society.

Why do YOU get the special stuff?! 

*Just kidding!* ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
SteamDB hasn't been updated either, despite claims that the cargo bay bug has been fixed, I bet they're sitting on an internal release version, waiting for the servers to finish migrating.

wow, another 10 pages since my last post, maybe we will surpass 300 pages by release!

Hype on Hypie McHyperton!
You have to go to it from google, linking from the forums doesn't show it. Also, it takes a while for the planet to load.

> 
> You don't see this?
> [http://i.imgur.com/1duLEyc.png](http://i.imgur.com/1duLEyc.png)

What? You get a cool background and I get boring text...

I've never had a dream of KSP ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

*As far as I know...*

Well I have it....

[https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/](https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/)
Okay,WE GET IT! You're special,we're not! **WE GET IT**

> 
> SteamDB hasn't been updated either, despite claims that the cargo bay bug has been fixed, I bet they're sitting on an internal release version, waiting for the servers to finish migrating.

They basically confirmed this anyway. In the AMA somebody asked about the bug and the response was along the lines of 'the bug is fixed but will be in the next update since we are code locked'. The key being code locked, they are certainly ready to go if that's the case, they're just waiting on a few things to happen other than coding, like the server migration....or hitting 300 pages.

> 
> You have to go to it from google, linking from the forums doesn't show it. Also, it takes a while for the planet to load.

Even then, I get nothing but text. 

What browser, Mozilla? I've got Chrome.

> 
> Well I have it....
> [https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/](https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/)

I used to see that, but now I don't. Is this the KSP blue dress?
Wait, now I'm not getting the pretty pic! What?

The Hype pressure is off the scale! The Hype boiler is leaking hype at the seams! She can't take much more of this cap'n! It's gunna blow!

I gotta wait till after work tomorrow. Hopefully the servers have calmed down by then.

> 
> Even then, I get nothing but text. 
> What browser, Mozilla? I've got Chrome.

I'm using internet explorer currently, but the pic no show up anymore:(
I thought I was "special"? (that's what my mum always said!) :-(
Everyone is special,but in their own unique way ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> The Hype pressure is off the scale! The Hype boiler is leaking hype at the seams! She can't take much more of this cap'n! It's gunna blow!
> I gotta wait till after work tomorrow. Hopefully the servers have calmed down by then.

The boiler is over pressurizing? That actually sounds really bad, someone wake up Gregrox or else we may all be in big trouble. The AI is clearly not doing it's job properly.

> 
> Everyone is special,but in their own unique way ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I'm special, in that the image used to show up for me, but doesn't anymore.

> 
> Why wouldn't they? We tried to order them pizza once...

Damn that Dominos not taking credit cards!!

> 
> I'm special, in that the image used to show up for me, but doesn't anymore.

I'm special in the exact same way as you!

So the servers are being migrated to accommodate the extra traffic, is this right? 

If that is true than another 20 minutes for midnight EST: Hype is everywhere!

> 
> I'm special, in that the image used to show up for me, but doesn't anymore.

I'm special 'cause I still got the image.
I'm special because I said so ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
